Name: Codecarbon
Description: Track emissions from Compute and recommend ways to reduce their impact on the environment.

Name: Carbontracker
Description: Track and predict the energy consumption and carbon footprint of training deep learning models.

Name: TinyML
Description: A tool to calculate embodied and operation carbon of TinyML in different hardware configuration.

Name: Greenchip
Description: A tool designed to compare energy and emission costs between computer chips

Name: 3D-Carbon
Description: A analytical tool to calculate embodied and operation carbon of 3D/2.5D ICs.

Name: ACT
Description: An analytical, architectural carbon model to estimate operational and embodied carbon.

Name: Eco2AI
Description: A python library which accumulates statistics about power consumption and CO2 emission during running code.

Name: EIT
Description: A simple drop-in method to track energy usage, carbon emissions, and compute utilization of your system.

Name: GreenAlgorithms
Description: A tool to estimate and report the carbon footprint of their computation.

Name: Cumulator
Description: A tool to quantify and report the carbon footprint of machine learning computations and communication
